price: They will say, “Before this, we used to be in awe [of Allah] when we were living among our people.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
